title: Riot, Give Us Pool Party Ahri, Please.
body:
(Remember to up vote if you like!)

http://i.imgur.com/dSzvNS3.jpg

Newest piece done by Artgerm (Stanley Lau). He doesn't work for Riot, but did commission work such as Yasuo's preview art and Le Blanc's official splash art, and a lot more stuff too. This is his fan art piece.

Oh yeah, he's also done two earlier fanart pieces of Ahri too: 

http://artgerm.deviantart.com/art/Foxy-Ahri-399325683

http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/321/0/1/ahri_final_lr_by_artgerm-d86qlz2.jpg

So um, Riot pls?

I totally agree with you. If anyone deserves an absurd amount of fanservice/sexy skin, it's Ahri. And sans the fox features, Ahri fits that role of female with a humanoid body so she's in the clear when what I was suggesting :)

I am against it. I think with this skin at the very least would degrade the champion into something she is not and insult many of our female players. If it would be a pool party skin then i would want something around Leona's skin, a beach skirt with a one piece bathing suit. It still stays within the skin idea and does not piss off our respective female players by oversexualizing female champions.

They ought to return that same respect by allowing us, the male populace that would like something like this, to have our fair share of the game. We don't ask for all the female champions to be "oversexualized", but we would like some. One or two. If the female players want to have a return, then they should to ask for a skin for themselves.

We don't want boobs, tits, ass everywhere. We do desire some satisfaction though.

You already have a lot of skins, y'know. Masquerade Evelynn, Officer Caitlyn, Battle Bunny Riven, that sort of thing. Sure, Ahri's skins should probably be sexy/tempting, but you already have a lot of material. Just saying. :)

Two of the Three look terrible and are outdated imo. I might've been too modest with my statement of "One or two.", but you get the idea. It's about not having to answer to the beck and call of every person offended by the "sexual nature" of a skin that a good number of people want. Just because we have material, as you call it, doesn't mean we can't ask for more. It's not like we're asking for bikini top and thong Kayle. We have - and by  this I mean the majority of players not the few minority - respectfully ***not *** asked for a sexualized skin of characters that were not meant to be viewed that way.

Yeah, well, that's the three I thought of off the top of my head.

I think that a lot of the problem comes from group A wanting sexy skins for characters that group B feels are not meant to be viewed that way. Say, group A wants Sunbather Leona, with a barely-there bikini, while group B feels that Leona Was Not Meant To Be Viewed That Way. Then they take to the boards and there's a lot of hurt feelings. Then there's group C who wants sexy skins for the male characters.

Yeah, good catch on the Sona. As for Janna, I personally see her as more distant/unapproachable/ethereal than sexy, but views may vary.

One thing I'd like is for the community to broaden its view on "sexy". Sexy doesn't have to mean "low amount of clothes", sure Bikini Ahri can be sexy, but Slinky Dress Ahri can be just as sexy, if not more. In my view, sexy is more of an aura and presentation instead of just a lack of clothing. I think that the sexiest clothes are actually clothes that reveal a significant amount, but hint at what may lie underneath.

> does not piss off our respective female players by oversexualizing female champions.

... So you're one of *those* guys.

Isn't it highly presumptuous to say that a fictional woman wearing a revealing outfit will "piss off" female players? As it turns out, there are plenty of women who like such clothes, both in the real world and in fiction and art. What's the excuse for them, are they all suffering from "internalized sexism"?

Varus, Yasuo, Lee Sin and others are shirtless male characters, many of them having well-toned bodies. *Most* male gamers don't look at them and get "pissed off" in any way. Or there's Graves with one of the few Pool Party skins in which the champ is completely shirtless, i.e. dressed appropriately for such an occasion.
Those titties look delicious.

I'm NOT suggesting she remain as conservative and covered up as Leona, but just that she needs some *originality* to her, and simply putting her in lingerie/a bikini would not do her justice.
